docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Admonitions
docs.text:

Look into documentation :

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nulla et euismod nulla. Curabitru fugiat, tortor non consequat finibus, justo purus auctor massa, nec semper lorem quam in massa.

docs.title: Code Example with pygments
docs.text:
Pigments are in : 

https://pygments.org/docs/lexers/

An example foa ccodeblock for Python

add_numbers.py
# Function to add tow numbers
def add_two_numbers(num1, num2):
    return num1 + num2

# Example usage
result = add_two_numbers(5,3)
print('The sum is:', result)

SLURM Example: mpi-example.sl

#SBATCH --node = 1
#SBATCH --ntasks = 10
#SBATCH --mem-per-cpu = 3G

srun mycode

BATCH example 

ssh usernamet@agamede.lgp.ehu.es

docs.title: Code Blocks in Content Tabs
Flowcharts
docs.text:
graph LR
  A[Start] --> B{Failure?};
  B --> |Yes| C[Investigate...];
  C --> D[Debug];
  D --> B;
  B --> |No| E[Success!];

## Sequence Diagram

sequenceDiagram
  autonumber
  Server->>Terminal: Send request
  loop Health
      Terminal->>Terminal: Check for health
  end
  Note right of Terminal: System online
  Terminal-->>Server: Everything is OK
  Terminal->>Database: Request customer data
  Database-->>Terminal: Customer data
